### Conditioning and drug tolerance

5 points

Classical conditioning and associative learning influence a wide range of psychological and physiological processes, including those involved in drug-tolerance.

Your assignment is to write a QALMRI summary for the following paper. A video lecture overview for this paper was also provided in the watch/listen section to help you with this assignment.

Siegel, S., Hinson, R. E., Krank, M. D., & McCully, J. (1982). Heroin "overdose" death: contribution of drug-associated environmental cues. Science, 216(4544), 436-437.

Using [the QALMRI method](https://www.crumplab.com/cognition/textbook/what-is-cognition.html#the-qalmri-method), write a one-page QALMRI (point form is OK) of the assigned paper.

- Question: Identify the big and specific question
- Alternatives: What are the alternative hypotheses or explanations
- Logic: What are the logical implications of the hypotheses
- Method: Describe the Methods
- Results: What was the main result
- Inference: What inferences about the hypothesis are made from the results?
